channel.title: Chinese new year on 刘征的博客
channel.description: Recent content in Chinese new year on 刘征的博客

item.title: Welcome to The Year of the Ox
item.description: It’s Chinese New Year’s Eve right now. The Chinese lunar new year came, it’s “The Year of the Ox”. I think you may like the above cute little ox and fortune; I hope you all the best. There are some pics I took tonight.
